title: Pbe Pings 30 to 500
body:
Can you guys help me with this, Why my ping goes from 30 to 500 every 10 seconds

** I live in north america

replies.body: Damn, that sounds like some severe packet loss or instability.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these impacted games to help us get an overview of what's happening.  Let me know your results, and we can go from there.
My results are ---- ** The worst ping you experienced was 49ms. **---**Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.02%.**

Any packet loss at all is pretty bad, really.  Are you on wifi?  Run through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which should help tune up some of the instability in your network.
No, Im not on Wifi - Where i need to go on ...connection issues...
I recommend going through each step, this will help rule out possibilities with the most common cases.
